title: Peace Corps Kenya
description: Served as a STEM teacher and led community development projects including building a school laboratory, establishing a demonstration garden, and implementing a pumped water system.

title: Keep The Beep
description: Designed a ruggedized soft housing for GE Carescape physiological monitors to prevent damage during high-pressure patient transport.

title: Rainfall Sensor Network
description: Developed low-cost distributed rainfall sensors for localized weather data collection and analysis.

title: Personal Robotics
description: A collection of mechatronics projects including a 4-DOF robotic arm, self-balancing robot, and 3D printed hexapod.

title: VAMPIRE Research
description: Conducted research on building heat loss using sensor networks. Authored papers on thermal analysis and sensor networks.

title: Sanitation Infrastructure
description: Technical Lead for Engineers Without Borders. Designed and managed the implementation of sanitation latrines for a school in Malawi.
